tool_description: Constructs detailed invoice line items with quantities, prices, discounts, and calculations for organized invoice presentation.

item_data.description: Array of item codes with quantities

unit_prices.description: Array of unit prices corresponding to items

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: item_data and unit_prices arrays must have the same length. Ensure each item has a corresponding price.
Invalid quantity: One or more quantities are zero or negative. All quantities must be positive numbers.
Invalid price: One or more unit prices are negative. All prices must be non-negative.
Item format error: Item data format is incorrect. Use format 'ITEM_CODE:QUANTITY' for each item.
usage: Provide item_data as an array of 'ITEM_CODE:QUANTITY' strings and corresponding unit_prices array. The tool will calculate line totals and format items for invoice display.

line_items.description: Formatted line items with descriptions, quantities, prices, and totals

subtotal.description: Sum of all line item totals before taxes and discounts

total_items.description: Total number of line items created
